comment: Smooth and drinkable. Heard bad things about the first batch, but I had batch 15 and thought it was just fine.
light color and flavor. slightly antiseptic up front and then spicy rye comes on takes over. could definitely improve with age.
[Whiskey Live NY 2018] - This can also be skipped....
My favorite local whiskey. On the rocks is smooth and delicious. Good for old fashions as well.

It's fruitier than you might expect from a Rye, but it has spice up front and a floral finish.  It reminds me of Japanese Whiskeys with higher wheat in the Nashville.  It does make a fine old fashioned.

Nose:
Sugar
Oak
Pickle?
Perfume

Taste:
Oak
Spice
Sugar
Finished another bottle making rye onion soup. Not too shabby. Batch 1702 bottle 75
To me a very pleasant rye. Very clean and gentle but the typical rye spice attack appears at the very end of the finish. Good stuff!
